name: Gericonia 2
description:
You are the leader of a new Settlement. Sent from the Capital, your goal is to tame the lands and uncover secrets. In this strategy game, you will build a city and manage different resources. Expand your town, battle outsiders, master the unknown and launch expeditions.

Key Features


  • Build homes for your people to live in.
  • Research new ways to improve your Settlement.
  • Battle hunger as you progress through the seasons.
  • Defend your Settlement from the natives that inhabit the land.
  • Launch expeditions to further improve your town and fight ancient beasts and uncover treasures.
